value.stringValue: v12 (including for indemnities) limited to 12 months of license fees, except where must be unlimited by law. Indirect damages excluded.
v12 (including for indemnities) limited to 12 months of license fees, except where must be unlimited by law. Indirect damages excluded.

v13 limited to the total amount of Subscription Fee (excluding VAT) owed under this Agreement for the twelve (12) month period immediately preceding the final event giving rise to such liability. Indirect damages excluded
Reimbursable expenses shall be invoiced by Bynder to Customer within one (1) month of the last day of travel.
v.14 limited to the Subscription Fee payable by Customer to Bynder in the twelve months prior to the event giving rise to the claim. Indirect damages excluded.
No. Additional Subscription Days applicable (30 days)

Flow.description: BODEV-4481 Additional revenue fields on the Lead and Account objects Updated to flow to calculate the Revenue Range BODEV-4608 Is Squad Logic Fix

formulas.name: ClearbitEmployees
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} < 30, "Micro", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} < 250, "SMB", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} >= 250 && {!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} <= 999, "MM - Small", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} >= 1000 && {!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} <= 2499, "MM - Large", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} >= 2500 && {!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} <= 14999, "Enterprise", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} >= 15000 , "Strategic", NULL))))) )

formulas.description: Check for the Work Location of the User and Map it to the corresponding Region
formulas.name: Determine_Region_For_Is_Squad

formulas.description: Uses the ISNEW logic like in process builder.
formulas.name: frmISNEW

formulas.description: New Logic to determine Is Squad Customer
formulas.name: Is_Squad_Customer_Logic
formulas.expression: IF( {!Determine_Region_For_Is_Squad} = 'USA' && (TEXT({!$Record.Customer_Tier__c}) = 'Tier 3' || TEXT({!$Record.Customer_Tier__c}) = 'Tier 4'), TRUE, IF( {!Determine_Region_For_Is_Squad} = 'EMEA' && TEXT({!$Record.Customer_Tier__c}) = 'Tier 4', TRUE, IF( TEXT({!$Record.Support_Plan__c}) = 'Standard Success Package' || TEXT({!$Record.Support_Plan__c}) = 'Basic', TRUE, FALSE ) ) )

Flow.label: Account [BSF] Handler
